description: The Snowcrew Anorak features Ventia 2L waterproof, breathable technology, providing storm-worthy protection for active use in rugged, demanding conditions. Built with VerticalX Eco, high-loft synthetic insulation made from 85% recycled content, it has a superior warmth-to-weight ratio, breathability, and moisture management, making it ideal for outdoor adventures. <br><br>The anorak also has a wire brim and Hood Lock for a custom fit, fully seam-taped construction, brushed tricot chin guard, multiple hood adjustments, and is Snowsports helmet-compatible. The Snowcrew Anorak's thoughtful design is perfect for resort skiing and snowboarding.
name: Snowcrew Anorak - Womens
